definitions: Joining (two pieces of rope or wire) by interweaving their strands.
Joining (two pieces of film, magnetic tape, or similar material) by overlapping and securing their ends.
Inserting (a gene or genetic material) into a new position in a DNA strand.
examples: The sailor was skilled at splicing ropes.
She spent hours splicing the film together.
Scientists are researching methods for splicing genes.
